title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: When declaring warnings on binary files in the form 'java|aj', the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. I have also observed cases where the filenames do not appear at all, although these tests do not reproduce that issue.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for .class files from injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..' code.
2. Observe the source path in the declare warning messages for .class files from injars, which should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
